page.title: 04SMALLER CARAVAN-CAMPING SITE
page.content: This area has many caravan and camping sites.The popular ones are Unity Farm and Sandy Glade,they are quite big have plenty to do.Unity Farm can accomodate up to 750 units in three seperate areas,all close to facilities. It provides sites for tents,motor homes and static holiday vans. Dogs are accepted in certain areas provided they are kept on a lead. Some of the facilities avalible are,a reception which sells camping equipment.They also have a "Bert's Bar" which offers free live entertainment to residents.There is also a childrens room and a beer garden.There is a shop, telephones and a small train which goes round the site.They have showers, toilets and washroom.They have a guard dog patrol.There is a path which runs from the site to the Brean Leisure Centre which is only a short walk.
